text: Apple TV is a digital media player and microconsole. Apple TV may also refer to: * Apple TV (software), a media player application * Apple TV Software, the operating system for earlier Apple TV hardware * Apple TV+, a video on demand web television service ==See also== * Macintosh TV, a personal computer with integrated television capabilities released in 1993 * Apple Interactive Television Box, a prototype television set-top box 1994–1995 Category:Apple Inc.
title: Apple TV (disambiguation)
